divs: Sighting Detailsbrother inlaw and myself went hunting for raccoon saw lite shining thru trees thot it was just the moonafter a while started walking up to my mothers house felt like somethging was following us we turned and saw this weird object just hovering above the corn field no sound but huge lite shining from front of objectscared but curious enuff to make sure wot we were seeing broke out in a cold sweat but walked close enuff to touch it if i chose to next time i remember we were just standing up from sitting next to barn and saw the object slowly drifting back towards the woods as if we had just seen it for the first time a time loss apparently cant say for sure we ran to house and told wot we saw my mom brother inlaw and sister stood by the back fence looking toward the woods a flash shot up from where we were looking and it was gone my mom called neighbor up the road to ask if they saw anything lady said she did not but that her husband had just lost his eyesight 20 min earlier his site returned ther shortly after i was home on leave from the servikce at the time my brother inlaw never spoke of it since then he became very scared wen the subject was brought up he took his own life several years later in 1984 i answered an ad in our local paper asking info on ufo sightings a couple weeks later a letter came to me saying mr weber i believe was his name said mr weber had become very ill after he read my story it stated he could not respond back to me also saying there was a very dark cloud over my head? from that point on i became a believer as in the past before i did not believe in such things.my story is true and am willing to take lie detector test or hypnosis i know wot i saw!
